job_description: Build and maintain the front end of our web applications.
Develop server-side logic and integrate with front end applications.
Work on both frontend and backend development.
Analyze data to provide insights and support decision-making.
Optimize and automate our deployment pipelines and infrastructure.
Create and implement design strategies to improve product usability.
Protect our systems and data from security threats.
Create and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android.
